bibl.title: Linen Furnishing Textiles with Pile in the Collection of Katoen Natie.
bibl.note: Collection privée du groupe Katoen Natie, conservée à Anvers. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Technical features. - 3. Types of loops. - 4. The textiles. - 5. Intended use of the fabrics. - 6. Conclusion.

bibl.title: assisted by Susanne Martinssen-von Falck, Clothing the House. Furnishing Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 5th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 6-7 October 2007.

bibl.seg: Verhecken-Lammens Chris, Linen Furnishing Textiles with Pile in the Collection of Katoen Natie.

Antoine De Moor and Cäcilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Susanne Martinssen-von Falck, Clothing the House. Furnishing Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 5th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 6-7 October 2007 (Tielt, 2009) pp. 132-143, 4 tabl., 14 figg. n./bl. et coul.
